Haku_Susanoo.NAME: SUSANO'OH
Haku_Susanoo.FLAVOR: When this theme was released, 6B was a low.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you play 3 cards, gain 1 #ymagatama.

Haku_Susanoo2.NAME: SUSANO'OH II
Haku_Susanoo2.FLAVOR: And people though he was gonna be low tier in CP1.0.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 1 [R] and lose 1 #ymagatama at the start of each turn.

Haku__BlackAndWhite.NAME: Black & White
Haku__BlackAndWhite.FLAVOR: It doesn't matter if you are black or white~

Haku__SixHeroes.NAME: SIX HEROES
Haku__SixHeroes.FLAVOR: This is legit the only enjoyable thing about the Nine match-up.

Haku__InJustice.NAME: In Justice
Haku__InJustice.FLAVOR: Remember when Izayoi was mid tier?

Haku_BurstIcon.NAME: Burst icon
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add one #yBurst to your draw pile and change its cost to 0 this combat.

Haku_BarrierGauge.NAME: BarrierGauge
Haku_BarrierGauge.FLAVOR: It is a good thing Amane isn't in this game.
DESCRIPTIONS: Right-click on it to gain 8 blocks, recharge every 5 turns.

Haku_Timer.NAME: Timer
Haku_Timer.FLAVOR: And time, time, is not on your side!
DESCRIPTIONS: On the 10th turn of each battle, kill all non-boss enemies whose current hp/max hp ratio is lower than yours.

Haku_Roundstart.NAME: Roundstart
Haku_Roundstart.FLAVOR: Heaven or Hell... wait wrong game.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain 1 random buff between 1 #yStrength, 1 #yDexterity, 4 #yPlated #yArmor, 3 #yThorns, 1 #yIntangible.

Haku_ContinuumShift.NAME: Continuum Shift
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you #ySmith, upgrade an additional random card.

Haku_CalamityTrigger.NAME: Calamity Trigger
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you play a card whose cost has been modified, gain 4 #yBlocks.

Haku_ChronoPhantasma.NAME: Chrono Phantasma
Haku_ChronoPhantasma.FLAVOR: 5C > 623AA > J.2C > 2C > 9jc > J.2A > 9jc > Delay J.2C > 5A > 5B > 9jc > J.B2A > 9jc > J.B2A > J.214A
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each battle, gain #yStrength for every 15HP missing.

Haku_CentralFiction.NAME: Central Fiction
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw 1 more card at the start of each turn.
